IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package platforms

Package platforms

source code

Models of IMU components and platforms.

Submodules
  • imusim.platforms.accelerometers: Accelerometer models.
  • imusim.platforms.adcs: Analogue to digital converter models.
  • imusim.platforms.base: Base class for simulated hardware platforms.
  • imusim.platforms.basestations: Basestation hardware platform models.
  • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes: Gyroscope models.
  • imusim.platforms.imus: IMU hardware platform models.
  • imusim.platforms.magnetometers: Magnetometer models.
  • imusim.platforms.radios: Radio models.
  • imusim.platforms.sensors: Base classes for sensor models.
  • imusim.platforms.timers: Models of hardware timers.
